trans-unit.source: ‚ÄúEric and his project Biop AI Ltd. have changed the way cancer is diagnosed towards a better society.‚Äù

trans-unit.source: ‚ÄúEric empowers others to change the world through his uniqueness and wise words. He transmits the passion on what he does and has helped many youngsters to find their way. As he says, there is only one life. You decide to die in a 9-5 full-time job or live doing what you love.‚Äù
trans-unit.target: ‚ÄúEric entusiasma a otros a cambiar el mundo a trav√©s de su identidad y sus sabias palabras. Transmite passion en lo que hace y lo que dice y definitivamente ha ayudado a muchos j√≥venes a encontrar su camino. Tal y como dice, solo hay una vida. Tu decides si quieres morir en una jornada 9-5 a tiempo completo o vivir haciendo lo que amas.‚Äù

trans-unit.source: Xavier Testar ‚Äì Teacher at University of Barcelona
trans-unit.target: Xavier Testar ‚Äì Profesor a la Universidad de Barcelona

trans-unit.source: I suffered from bullying at high school because I was overweight. Depression and video games were my only way of exit of the real world. I started Biop AI Ltd. as a way to fulfil one of my main dreams, save my aunt who is suffering from Stage IV Metastatic Lung Cancer. During this 5-year journey I understood that there is only 1 life to spend such amount of time on getting prepared to be ready for a 9-5 job that won¬¥t fill any little of your happiness. Live or die. Now I am the co-founder of Biop AI and Nutrilieve as well as an international speaker with the aim to change the rules, to help the youngsters and corporates to step outside of the routine and take action by doing things that motivate them and fill the happiness tank.
trans-unit.target: Sufr√≠ acoso en el instituto por mi sobrepeso. La depresi√≥n y los videojuegos eran mi √∫nica v√≠a de escape del mundo real. Empec√© Biop AI Ltd. como una manera de perseguir uno de mis grandes sue√±os, curar a mi abuela la cual sufre de estadio IV metast√°tico de c√°ncer de pulm√≥n. Durante este periodo de 5 a√±os he aprendido que solo hay 1 vida como para perder tanto tiempo prepar√°ndose para tener un trabajo de 9-5 que en verdad no contribuir√° para nada a nuestra felicidad. Vive o Muere, t√∫ decides. Ahora mismo soy el co-fundador de Biop AI y Nutrilieve a la vez que un orador internacional el cual pretende cambiar las reglas y ayudar a los empleados y a los j√≥venes a optimizar sus recursos y buscar m√°s all√° de la rutina mediante acciones que les motiven y llenen su tanque de felicidad.

trans-unit.source: SPEAKING
trans-unit.target: ORACI√ìN

trans-unit.source: I simply did too many mistakes. We will all live around 80 years, you decide whether you want to spend your time working for living or you want to live and have an impact on the world. People will remember you for your achievements, not for the money you have on the pocket.
trans-unit.target: Simplemente realic√© demasiados errores. Todos vivimos alrededor de 80 a√±os, t√∫ decides si quieres pasar ese tiempo trabajando para vivir o si quieres vivir para tener un impacto en el mundo. La gente te recordar√° por lo que has conseguido, no por la cantidad de dinero que tengas en la cuenta.

trans-unit.source: Since I was young I had ever been the most popular guy in the class neither the smartest or the fittest. Indeed, during my school I suffered from bullying as I was a fat guy with classes who was studying all day. Or that is what they thing. I was not just a hard-working guy, I was also getting enough information in order to transform the world.
trans-unit.target: Desde que fui peque√±o jam√°s he sido el chico m√°s popular de la clase ni tampoco el m√°s inteligente o el m√°s deportista. Es m√°s, durante mi infancia sufr√≠ acoso dado que era un chico obeso con gafas que se pasaba todo el d√≠a estudiando. O eso es lo que ellos pensaban. No era √∫nicamente un chico muy trabajador, sino que adem√°s me estaba preparando para obtener la informaci√≥n necesaria para cambiar el mundo.

trans-unit.source: All my childhood has been influenced by my aunt. She had suffered twice from breast cancer, once from tyroid cancer and right now, in 2020, she is undergoing stage IV metastatic lung cancer. Her lungs look like a cake full of small and destructive chocolate bombs. She is my superhero is only one of the more than 8 million superheroes that struggle against cancer every year. I was more focused on what I could do to save her rather than taking care of myself.
trans-unit.target: Durante toda mi infancia mi mayor influente ha sido mi abuela, la cual ha sufrido en un par de ocasiones de c√°ncer de mama, una vez c√°ncer de tiroides y actualmente se encuentra en estadio IV metast√°tico de c√°ncer de pulm√≥n. Sus pulmones parecen un pastel lleno de diminutas y destructivas virutas de chocolate. No obstante, mi t√≠a siempre se ha configurado como mi mayor superh√©roe y lucha junto a otros m√°s de 8 millones de superh√©roes contra esta enfermedad conocida como c√°ncer. Durante ese periodo me encontr√© m√°s centrado en intentar salvarla a ella que en cuidar de mi mismo.

trans-unit.source: For that reason, when I was 15 I started my first project at the same time I got tired of my 9-2 school journey without having a real impact on her life and the life of others. At that same time Google released Tensorflow libraries and I decided to make use of my gained expertised in cancer and my understanding on programming in order to make something big. This initial project lately became Biop AI after 3 years. Biop AI is a UK-based company which makes usage of artificial intelligence for the early-stage cancer diagnosis. Our first product focuses on suspicious bad-moles diagnosis versus the healthy ones and is currently under clinical trials.
trans-unit.target: Por esa raz√≥n, cuando ten√≠a 15 a√±os comenc√© mi primer proyecto al mismo tiempo que me cans√© de mi viaje escolar de 9-2 sin tener un impacto real en su vida y la vida de los dem√°s. Al mismo tiempo, Google lanz√≥ las bibliotecas de Tensorflow y decid√≠ hacer uso de mi experiencia adquirida en c√°ncer y mi comprensi√≥n de la programaci√≥n para hacer algo grande. Este proyecto inicial se convirti√≥ recientemente en Biop AI despu√©s de 3 a√±os. Biop AI es una empresa con sede en el Reino Unido que utiliza la inteligencia artificial para el diagn√≥stico de c√°ncer en etapa inicial. Nuestro primer producto se centra en el diagn√≥stico de lunares malos sospechosos versus los sanos y actualmente se encuentra en ensayos cl√≠nicos.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, I also co-founded another company in Spain called Nutrilieve for developing personalized diets to oncologic patients undergoing chemotherapy and radiotherapy. The idea with it is to palliate side-effects through the diet.
trans-unit.target: Adem√°s, tambi√©n cofund√© otra compa√±√≠a en Espa√±a llamada Nutrilieve para desarrollar dietas personalizadas para pacientes oncol√≥gicos sometidos a quimioterapia y radioterapia. La idea es paliar los efectos secundarios a trav√©s de la dieta.

trans-unit.source: Looks cool right? Definitely. It is not cool just because I am fulfilling an inner passion but because it allows me to be HAPPY. Exactly, how many millions do you want in your bank account if you are not happy? Trading? Dropshipping?
trans-unit.target: Se ve bien, ¬øverdad? Seguro. No es genial solo porque estoy cumpliendo una pasi√≥n interior, sino porque me permite ser FELIZ. Exactamente, ¬øcu√°ntos millones quieres en tu cuenta bancaria si no est√°s contento? ¬øComercio? ¬øDropshipping?

trans-unit.source: What if I told you that you will be rich if you pursue your dreams instead of pursuing society dreams?
trans-unit.target: ¬øQu√© pasa si te digo que ser√°s rico si persigues tus sue√±os en lugar de perseguir los sue√±os de la sociedad?

trans-unit.source: I have been in Sherm El-Sheik (Africa), Silicon Valley (US), Shenzhen (China), Shangzhuo (China), London (EU), Amsterdam (EU), and many other places without spending a single penny.
